section.name: Section 5 - Reflection
section.summary: Set a goal for incorporating UDL principles into your teaching practice. If you currently address and incorporate UDL concepts and principles into your teaching, write a goal that either increases your focus on UDL in your lesson planning and design, or that refines your teaching practices to more effectively apply UDL concepts. The puspose of setting a goal is to help you have an end in mind, i.e., a way to refine your practice of teaching.
